title: East West Line track fault causing delays

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线轨道故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Ralat trek Laluan Timur Barat menyebabkan kelewatan
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் ஏற்பட்டுள்ள தடங்கல் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்துகிறது

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train service from #Bugis to #Aljunied is now running normally.
[EWL]:No train service from #Bugis to #Aljunied towards Pasir Ris due to defective 3rd rail. Power supply shut down for about 10 mins.
[EWL]: Estimate 5 mins additional travelling time from #Kallang to #Aljunied towards PasirRis due to track fault.
